sentences.english: This kind of water kettle is very practical because water can be drunk directly after its filtration.
sentences.chinese: 这种矿泉壶很实用，用它过滤后，水就可以直接喝了。

sentences.english: You've got to hand it to the bottled water industry.
sentences.chinese: 你一定是把钱拱手交给矿泉水业。

sentences.english: The luxury naturist holiday spot opened its doors earlier this year.
sentences.chinese: 这家豪华的矿泉疗养旅馆在今年早些时候已经开业。

sentences.english: Mr. Tilney was no fonder of the play than the pump-room.
sentences.chinese: 蒂尔尼先生看戏的兴趣，并不比去矿泉厅的兴趣大。

sentences.english: Like drinking up a whole bottle of contaminated mineral water.
sentences.chinese: 例如把整瓶不洁的矿泉水喝光。

sentences.english: Bantang mineral spring is a hypefthermy sulfate radon spring.
sentences.chinese: 半汤矿泉为高温硫酸盐氡泉。

sentences.english: This machine is used for mineral water bottles paper label removal.
sentences.chinese: 该机器用于矿泉水瓶标签纸的去除。

sentences.english: Objective To observe the effect of Lintong spa on some chemical elements in human body.
sentences.chinese: 目的研究临潼矿泉对人体某些化学成分的影响。

sentences.english: Mineral water, garbage bag, first-aid box ext.
sentences.chinese: 矿泉水，垃圾袋，急救药品等公共用品。

sentences.english: Firstly, I fetched two plastic cups and an empty bottle.
sentences.chinese: 我先取来两个塑料杯和一个空矿泉水瓶。

sentences.english: In this case, however, the location of the city corresponds with a plethora of hot mineral springs.
sentences.chinese: 在这种情况下，所在地的市，符合展演热矿泉。

sentences.english: Try one of the new mineral waters with a twist of lime or lemon, or sip some fruit juice.
sentences.chinese: 尝试一种加酸橙或柠檬的新矿泉水，或饮用些果汁。

sentences.english: No one can resist the refreshing taste of Mattoni with balanced complex of minerals.
sentences.chinese: 没有人会抵抗平衡矿物质清爽可口的玛朵尼矿泉水。

sentences.english: He always took the waters at Parr after his strenuous social season.
sentences.chinese: 社交忙季过后他常去矿泉胜地帕尔疗养。

sentences.english: This article briefly elaborates how to design the bucket lifted technique on the mineral water automatic production line.
sentences.chinese: 阐述了矿泉水自动生产线上水桶提升机的设计方案。

definition: Arishang Nahiyisi or Wenquan county in Börtala Mongol autonomous prefecture 博爾塔拉蒙古自治州|博尔塔拉蒙古自治州, Xinjiang
